mapper.select: SELECT ID, ADMIN_ID, MEMBER_IMAGE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_SMS, MEMBER_EMAILCHECK FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
SELECT ID, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_ID, ORDER_NUMBER, ORDER_DATE FROM TBL_ORDER ORDER BY ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PET(ID, MEMBER_ID, PET_KIND, PET_IMAGE, PET_NAME, PET_GENDER, PET_BREED, PET_BIRTH, PET_VET, PET_WEIGHT, PET_NEUTER) VALUES(PET_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{petKind}, #{petImage}, #{petName}, #{petGender}, #{petBreed}, #{petBirth}, #{petVet}, #{petWeight}, #{petNeuter})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, MEMBER_ID, PET_KIND, PET_IMAGE, PET_NAME, PET_GENDER, PET_BREED, PET_BIRTH, PET_VET, PET_WEIGHT, PET_NEUTER FROM TBL_PET TBP JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBP.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID AND TBM.ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY TBP.ID
